column1: The booking flow is integral to Ezra's business operation. Please go through the first three steps of the booking process including payment and devise 15 test cases throughout the entire process you think are the most important. When submitting the assignment, please return the test cases from the most important to the least important.
UN:
PW:

Pre Req:
Access/logged into https://myezra-staging.ezra.com/
Test Scenario
Verify Book a scan button is displayed via Home page
column2: Book a scan button displays on the Home screen in the Appointments section
column3: Displayed is Book a scan button in the Appointments section via the Home screeen

column1: Verify the page to Select your Scan is displayed
column2: After clicking Book a scan button, the Select your Scan page is displayed
column3: Displayed is the Select your Scan page

column1: Verify on the Select your Scan page, the user is able to click cancel and return to the Home page
column2: On the Select your Scan page, clicking the cancel button on the bottom of the page, returns users to the Home page

column1: Verify on the Select your Scan page, clicking "here" To learn more about MRI and CT scans, opens a seperate FAQ's page
column2: On the Select your Scan page, clicking the 'here' button opens up a seperate FAQ's page
column3: FAQ's page is displayed when 'here' button is clicked

column1: Verify on the Select your Scan page, a valid date of birth and sex at birth is required
column2: Required on the Select your Scan page, are valid date of birth and selection via drop-down of sex at birth

column1: Verify on the Select your Scan page, the selection of Lungs CT Scan is not enabled for users under 34 years of age
column2: On the Select your Scan page, Selection for Lungs CT Scan is disabled if the users age is under 34 years.

column1: Verify on the Select your Scan page, the selection of Lungs CT Scan is enabled when a user is over 34 years of age
column2: On the Select your Scan page, Selection for Lungs CT Scan is enabled when a user is over 34 years of age

column1: Verify on the Select your Scan page, some type of scan is required to continue to reserve your appointment
column2: On the Select your Scan page, a selection of any type of scan is required to for the continue button to be enabled
column3: Continue button is enabled when a selection of any type of scan is selected

column1: Verify on the Select your Scan page, after clicking continue button, Schedule your scan page is displayed
column2: On the Select your Scan page, when all required criteria and selections are chosen and the continue button is clicked, Schedule your scan page displays
column3: Displayed is the schedule your scan page

column1: Verify on the Schedule your scan page, the continue button becomes enabled when a location, date/time to book your scan is selected
column2: On the Schedule your scan page, when location, date and time to book your scan is chosen, the continue button becomes enabled
column3: Continue button is enabled when location, date and time to book your scan is selected

column1: Verify on the Schedule your scan page, clicking the continue button, displays the Reserve your appointment page
column2: Clicking the continue button displays the Reserve your appointment page

column1: Verify on the Schedule your scan page, all payment methods (CC, Affirm, Bank) can be used successfully and when the continue button is clicked, scan confirm page is displayed
column2: On the Schedule your scan page, all payment methods can be used and the scan confirm page is displayed after clicking the continue button
column3:
All payment methods can successfully be used and scan confirm page displays with the following:
Advising user to complete online medical questionnaire
Type of Scan:
Location:
Date:
Begin Medical Questionnaire button

column1: Verify on the scan confirm page, user can complete the medical questionnaire and return to dashboard
column2: On the Schedule your scan page, user can complete the questionnaire and return to dashboard
column3: User complete questionnaire and returned to dashboard

column1: Verify on the homepage, user is able to reschedule a scan and the update is reflected on the dashboard
column2: On the homepage, user selects a scan to reschedule and the update is reflected on the dashboard
column3: User reschedules the scan and the update is displayed on the dashboard

column1: Verify on the homepage, user is able to cancel the scan and the update is reflected on the dashboard
column2: On the homepage, user selects a scan to cancel and the update is reflected on the dashboard
column3: User cancels the scan and the update is displayed on the dashboard
